system:
note description: "Window intended for transient user interaction.%NOptionally modal. A modal dialog blocks the rest of the applicationuntil closed." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "dialog, dialogue, popup, window" date: "$Date: 2016-05-05 00:56:28 -0700 (Thu, 05 May 2016) $" revision: "$Revision: 98659 $"
class ../interface/ev_dialog.xmlEV_DIALOG
inherit ../interface/ev_titled_window.xmlEV_TITLED_WINDOW export {../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xmlEV_DOCKABLE_SOURCE_I} ../interface/ev_window_action_sequences.xml#f_close_request_actionsclose_request_actions redefine ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation, ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_create_implementationcreate_implementation, ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_initializeinitialize, ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_show_relative_to_windowshow_relative_to_window end
create ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_default_createdefault_create, ../interface/ev_window.xml#f_make_with_titlemake_with_title
feature {NONE} -- Initialization
f_initialize../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_initializeinitialize -- Initialize Current. -- Note that ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_dialog_key_press_actiondialog_key_press_action is inserted into the -- ../interface/ev_widget_action_sequences.xml#f_key_press_actionskey_press_actions. This handles the default and cancel -- button processing and can be removed if necessary. -- See comment of ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_dialog_key_press_actiondialog_key_press_action. do ../interface/ev_widget_action_sequences.xml#f_key_press_actionskey_press_actions.Falseextend (agent ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_dialog_key_press_actiondialog_key_press_action) ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_dialog_i.xml#f_disable_closeabledisable_closeable ../interface/ev_titled_window.xml#f_initializePrecursor {../interface/ev_titled_window.xmlEV_TITLED_WINDOW} end
feature -- Access
f_default_push_button../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_default_push_buttondefault_push_button: detachable ../interface/ev_button.xmlEV_BUTTON -- Default pushed button. This is the button that -- is pushed if the user press the enter key unless -- a push button is currently focused. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_dialog_i.xml#f_default_push_buttondefault_push_button end
f_default_cancel_button../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_default_cancel_buttondefault_cancel_button: detachable ../interface/ev_button.xmlEV_BUTTON -- Default cancel button. This is the button that -- is pushed if the user press the escape key or -- close the window using the close icon. -- If there is no default cancel button, the close -- icon is disabled. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_dialog_i.xml#f_default_cancel_buttondefault_cancel_button end
feature -- Access
f_is_modal../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_is_modalis_modal: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is Current shown modally to another window? -- If True then Current must be closed before -- application can receive user events again? require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_dialog_i.xml#f_is_modalis_modal end
f_is_relative../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_is_relativeis_relative: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is Current shown relative to another window? require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_dialog_i.xml#f_is_relativeis_relative end
f_blocking_window../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_blocking_windowblocking_window: detachable ../interface/ev_window.xmlEV_WINDOW -- Result is window Current is shown to if -- ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_is_modalis_modal or ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_is_relativeis_relative. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_dialog_i.xml#f_blocking_windowblocking_window ensure bridge_ok: Result = ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_dialog_i.xml#f_blocking_windowblocking_window end
feature -- Status Setting
f_set_default_push_button../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_set_default_push_buttonset_default_push_button (a_button: ../interface/ev_button.xmlEV_BUTTON) -- Assign a_button to default push button. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed a_button_not_void: a_button /= Void has_button: ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_has_recursivehas_recursive (a_button) do ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_dialog_i.xml#f_set_default_push_buttonset_default_push_button (a_button) ensure default_push_button_set: ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_default_push_buttondefault_push_button = a_button end
f_remove_default_push_button../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_remove_default_push_buttonremove_default_push_button -- Remove ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_default_push_buttondefault_push_button. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed has_default_push_button: ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_default_push_buttondefault_push_button /= Void do ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_dialog_i.xml#f_remove_default_push_buttonremove_default_push_button ensure not_has_default_push_button: ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_default_push_buttondefault_push_button = Void end
f_set_default_cancel_button../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_set_default_cancel_buttonset_default_cancel_button (a_button: ../interface/ev_button.xmlEV_BUTTON) -- Assign a_button to ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_default_cancel_buttondefault_cancel_button. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed a_button_not_void: a_button /= Void has_button: ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_has_recursivehas_recursive (a_button) do ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_dialog_i.xml#f_set_default_cancel_buttonset_default_cancel_button (a_button) ensure default_cancel_button_set: ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_default_cancel_buttondefault_cancel_button = a_button end
f_remove_default_cancel_button../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_remove_default_cancel_buttonremove_default_cancel_button -- Remove ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_default_cancel_buttondefault_cancel_button. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed has_default_cancel_button: ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_default_cancel_buttondefault_cancel_button /= Void do ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_dialog_i.xml#f_remove_default_cancel_buttonremove_default_cancel_button ensure not_has_default_cancel_button: ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_default_cancel_buttondefault_cancel_button = Void end
feature -- Basic operations
f_show_modal_to_window../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_show_modal_to_windowshow_modal_to_window (a_window: ../interface/ev_window.xmlEV_WINDOW) -- Show and wait until Current is closed. -- Current is shown modal with respect to a_window. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed dialog_modeless: not ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_is_modalis_modal a_window_not_void: a_window /= Void a_window_not_current: a_window /= Current do ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_dialog_i.xml#f_show_modal_to_windowshow_modal_to_window (a_window) if attached ../interface/ev_shared_application.xml#f_shared_environmentShared_environment.../interface/ev_environment.xml#f_applicationapplication as application then application.../interface/ev_application.xml#f_register_windowregister_window (Current) end ensure dialog_closed_so_no_blocking_window: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed implies ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_blocking_windowblocking_window = Void end
f_show_relative_to_window../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_show_relative_to_windowshow_relative_to_window (a_window: ../interface/ev_window.xmlEV_WINDOW) -- Show Current with respect to a_window. do ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_dialog_i.xml#f_show_relative_to_windowshow_relative_to_window (a_window) if attached ../interface/ev_shared_application.xml#f_shared_environmentShared_environment.../interface/ev_environment.xml#f_applicationapplication as application then application.../interface/ev_application.xml#f_register_windowregister_window (Current) end ensure then is_relative_to_window: ../interface/ev_window_action_sequences.xml#f_show_actionsshow_actions.Falseis_empty implies ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_is_relativeis_relative blocking_window_set: ../interface/ev_window_action_sequences.xml#f_show_actionsshow_actions.Falseis_empty implies ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_blocking_windowblocking_window = a_window end
f_dialog_key_press_action../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_dialog_key_press_actiondialog_key_press_action (a_key: ../interface/ev_key.xmlEV_KEY) -- The action performed to process default push and cancel -- buttons. This is inserted in ../interface/ev_widget_action_sequences.xml#f_key_press_actionskey_press_actions and -- behaves as follows: -- If escape is pressed at any time then -- If there is a ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_default_cancel_buttondefault_cancel_button then -- If it is sensitive, call its select_actions, -- otherwise, close the dialog. -- If there is no ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_default_cancel_buttondefault_cancel_button, do nothing. -- If enter is pressed at any time then -- If a push button is currently focused then call its -- select_actions. If no push button has the focus, then -- call the select_actions of the default push button if -- it is sensitive. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_dialog_i.xml#f_dialog_key_press_actiondialog_key_press_action (a_key) end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I, ../interface/ev_any_handler.xmlEV_ANY_HANDLER} -- Implementation
f_implementation../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation: ../implementation_interface/ev_dialog_i.xmlEV_DIALOG_I -- Responsible for interaction with native graphics toolkit.
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_create_implementation../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_create_implementationcreate_implementation -- See {EV_ANY}.create_implementation. do create {../implementation_gtk/ev_dialog_imp.xmlEV_DIALOG_IMP} ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_gtk/ev_dialog_imp.xml#f_makemake end
invariant modal_or_relative: ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_usableis_usable implies (../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_is_modalis_modal implies not ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_is_relativeis_relative and ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_is_relativeis_relative implies not ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_is_modalis_modal) blocking_window_correct: ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_usableis_usable implies (../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_is_modalis_modal or ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_is_relativeis_relative implies ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_blocking_windowblocking_window /= Void) no_blocking_window_correct: ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_usableis_usable implies (not ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_is_modalis_modal and not ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_is_relativeis_relative implies ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_blocking_windowblocking_window = Void) no_blocking_window_when_hidden: ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_usableis_usable implies (not ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_is_show_requestedis_show_requested implies ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_blocking_windowblocking_window = Void)

end -- class ../interface/ev_dialog.xmlEV_DIALOG
